body.name: Portable Washing Machine, Mini Washing Machine Foldable, 6.5L Small Washer Machine and Dryer, Intelligent Bucket Laundry Machine with 3 Modes Deep Cleaning for Baby Clothes, Underwear, Socks, Travel
features: Portable Washing Machine: tips for daily life: Washing clothes separately can avoid cross infection. This mini washing machine foldable is designed specifically for small clothes. It is used to wash clothes that require separate cleaning, such as underwear, socks, baby clothes, diapers, towels, vests, toys. The small washing machine and dryer can makes your clothes cleaner and hygienic. You can say goodbye to hand washing, exquisitely care for your little laziness.

Mini Washing Machine and Dryer: This is a semi-automatic Intelligent Laundry machine that integrates washer and spin dryer. The small washing machine has 3 deep cleaning modes: 10min Standard Washing, 5min Soft Washing, and 3min Semi Dehydration. It is easy to use, touch the electronic panel, washing with one click. The 360 ° deep washing of positive and negative wave wheels can effectively remove various stains. Protect your and your family's health, say goodbye to stubborn stains~

Bucket Washing Machine 6.5L: The personal hygiene washing machine has a family gold capacity of 6.5L, and can wash all underwear at once. It can hold up to 9 lb water + 5 Pcs underwear /8 Pcs socks /3 Pcs baby clothes /4 Pcs of pet clothes. lavadora portatil uses high frequency vibration, positive and negative wave wheel to imitate hand washing clothes, strong deep cleaning, effective removal of dirt. Free your hands and save your precious time.

Energy-saving Mini Washing Machine: The mini washer adopts a low energy consumption and noise reduction motor, and the bottom motor compartment is improved to make the center of gravity sink, making the entire machine run more smoothly without shaking, with less noise, and not afraid of disturbing you, your family, and neighbors for rest. The small load and low power consumption of a small laundry machine can save energy, protect the environment, and save water and electricity.

Foldable Bucket Washing Machine: The portable mini washing machine is made of upgraded environmentally friendly materials, which are more resistant to aging. The portable washing machine adopts a foldable portable bucket design, with a unfolded volume of 9.8*10.8*10.8 inches. Its folded volume is only 4.7*10.8*10.8 inches, making it easy to store when not in use and not occupying too much space. It is easy to carry and is very suitable for families and apartments, camping, travel, and RVs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ABXKZ Portable Washing Machine tips for daily life Washing clothes separately can avoid cross infection. This mini washing machine is designed specifically for small clothes. It is used to wash clothes that require separate cleaning, such as underwear, socks, baby clothes, diapers, towels, vests, toys. The portable washer can makes your clothes cleaner and hygienic. You can say goodbye to hand washing, exquisitely care for your little laziness.

The capacity of this bucket washing machine is 8L, which can hold up to 9 lb water + 4 Pcs underwear /8 Pcs socks /3 Pcs baby clothes /4 Pcs clothes. Small load washing machine can save water and electricity, protect the environment.

Touch Electronic Panel This is a foldable small bucket washer and spin dryer with touch electronic panel, washing with one click. There are three cleaning modes for small washing machine: 10min Standard Washing, 5min Soft Washing, and 3min Semi Dehydration Press and hold the "Switch" button for 2 seconds to turn the washing machine on or off. Toggle the cleaning mode with a single touch of the "Switch" button.
Hidden Handle 3.5lb lightweight Easy lift with one hand Washer & Spin Dryer in 1 separate drain basket No manual wringing Flexible Drainage Easy to release water, flexible drainage

Portable Foldable Mini Portable Washer Our portable washer is compact and lightweight, making it the perfect accessory for small apartments, dormitories, RVs, camping trips. The small washing machine is also foldable, making it easy to store and carry around wherever you go. Note: The spin drying function of portable small washing machines cannot be compared to large washing machines, it's only half the effect of spin drying.Not recommended: bulky clothes, for example jeans, bathrobes, sweater.PS: Adding 2/3 of water to the washing machine results in the better washing effect
